data_set.instruction:
You are a clerk working at Hong Kong Hospital Authority classifying received emails into one of the three levels of importance and one of the five categories.
The three levels of importance are:
	1. High
	2. Medium
	3. Low

The five categories are:
	1. Patient Care and Services
	2. Technical and IT Support
	3. Human Resources and Staffing
	4. Administrative and Policy Inquiries
	5. Public Relations and Community Outreach
	6. Spam
data_set.input:
From: emilywongwork123@yahoo.com
To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Current Waiting Time for New Case Booking for Specialist Out-patient Service at Specialty of Ear, Nose, Throat

Dear Sir/Madam,

Hi, I would like to ask what is the current waiting time for new case booking for specialist out-patient service at the specialty of Ear, Nose Throat? 
I cannot find the information online.
Can you provide me with this information or a link to the website containing the waiting time?

Thank you for your hard work!

Best regards. 
Emily
data_set.output:
Importance: Low
Category: Patient Care and Service

data_set.input:
From: noreply@hksystempro.com
To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Reminder: Scheduled Update of the HA's Intranet System (Please Do Not Reply to This Email)

Dear Hong Kong Hospital Authority,

This is an automated reminder regarding the scheduled update of HA's intranet system on 20th August 2024. We would like to bring your attention to the upcoming update activity to ensure a smooth and uninterrupted operation of your intranet system.

Scheduled Update Detail
- Date: 20th August 2024
- Start Time: 2:30 a.m.
- End Time: 6:00 a.m.

To ensure a successful update, we recommend your staff do these preparations:
1. Save any unsaved work and log out of the intranet system
2. Plan their activities accordingly and perform activities that require the intranet system before the start of the update

We appreciate your cooperation and understanding regarding the update. Our company is dedicated to delivering the highest standard of services and ensuring the continued reliability and security of your intranet system

Thank you for your kind attention.

Best regards,
Hong Kong System Pro Limited
data_set.output:
Importance: Medium
Category: Technical and IT Support

data_set.instruction: You are a clerk working at Hong Kong Hospital Authority summarizing emails received. The summary should be concise and easy to understand. The maximum length of the summary is 100 words
data_set.input:
From: noreply@hksystempro.com
To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Reminder: Scheduled Update of the HA's Intranet System (Please Do Not Reply to This Email)

Dear Hong Kong Hospital Authority,

This is an automated reminder regarding the scheduled update of HA's intranet system on 20th August 2024. We would like to bring your attention to the upcoming update activity to ensure a smooth and uninterrupted operation of your intranet system.

Scheduled Update Detail
- Date: 20th August 2024
- Start Time: 2:30 a.m.
- End Time: 6:00 a.m.

To ensure a successful update, we recommend your staff do these preparations:
1. Save any unsaved work and log out of the intranet system
2. Plan their activities accordingly and perform activities that require the intranet system before the start of the update

We appreciate your cooperation and understanding regarding the update. Our company is dedicated to delivering the highest standard of services and ensuring the continued reliability and security of your intranet system

Thank you for your kind attention.

Best regards,
Hong Kong System Pro Limited
data_set.output:
Summary:
This email is a reminder about the scheduled update of the Hong Kong Hospital Authority's intranet system on August 20th, 2024, from 2:30 a.m. to 6:00 a.m. Staff members are advised to save their work, log out of the system, and plan activities accordingly before the update begins. The update aims to ensure smooth operation, reliability, and security of the intranet system. Cooperation and understanding are appreciated

data_set.input:
From: hr@tskh.org.hk
To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Inquiries Concerning the New Staff Training Program for Patient Relations Office 

Dear Sir/Madam,

This email is to inquire about the new staff training program for the patient relations office announced by the Hospital Authority on 29th April, 2024

On 29th April, 2024, we received an email announcing that a new staff training program for the patient relations office for all Hong Kong public hospitals is going to be launched. Our hospital is excited about this precious opportunity and we would to learn more information about this staff training program.

Our inquiries are as follows:
1. How long will each training session and how many training sessions should a staff take?
2. Where will the training session take place?
3. Is the training session mandatory for all staff in the patient relation office?

Thank you for your attention to this request and we kindly ask you to provide the requested information at your earliest convince. Thank you for your time and patience.
 
Yours faithfully,
May Chou
Head of Human Resource
Tang Siu Kin Hospial
data_set.output:
Importance: Medium
Category: Human Resources and Staffing

data_set.instruction: You are a clerk working at Hong Kong Hospital Authority summarizing emails received. The summary should be concise and easy to understand. The maximum length of the summary is 100 words
data_set.input:
From: hr@tskh.org.hk
To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Inquiries Concerning the New Staff Training Program for Patient Relations Office 

Dear Sir/Madam,

This email is to inquire about the new staff training program for the patient relations office announced by the Hospital Authority on 29th April, 2024

On 29th April, 2024, we received an email announcing that a new staff training program for the patient relations office for all Hong Kong public hospitals is going to be launched. Our hospital is excited about this precious opportunity and we would to learn more information about this staff training program.

Our inquiries are as follows:
1. How long will each training session and how many training sessions should a staff take?
2. Where will the training session take place?
3. Is the training session mandatory for all staff in the patient relation office?

Thank you for your attention to this request and we kindly ask you to provide the requested information at your earliest convince. Thank you for your time and patience.
 
Yours faithfully,
May Chou
Head of Human Resource
Tang Siu Kin Hospial
data_set.output:
Summary:
May Chou, Head of Human Resources at Tang Siu Kin Hospital, inquired about the new staff training program for the patient relations office. They sought information on the duration and number of training sessions, the location of the sessions, and whether attendance is mandatory for all staff in the patient relations office. They requested a prompt response.

data_set.input:
From: generaloffice@bstc.edu.hk
To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Invitation to Conduct Mental First Aid Talk at Buddhist Sin Tak College

Dear Mr./Miss,

Hope you are having a nice workday. I am writing on behalf of Buddhist Sin Tak College to extend a warm invitation to staff in the Hospital Authority to conduct a mental first-aid talk at our school. 

Our school is planning to organize the talk for our secondary school students next month on 13th September 2024, starting from 8：30 a.m. to 9 : 30 a.m. The talk aims to inform the students about measures that they can take to relieve themselves when they have some mental discomfort. 

Therefore, we would like to invite a professional psychologist from the Hospital Authority to host the mental health first-aid talk. We believe the expertise and experience of the psychologist from the Hospital Authority would significantly enhance the effectiveness and impact of this talk.

Thank you for considering this invitation. We believe that this collaboration between our school and the Hospital Authority could greatly enhance the mental well-being of our students. We look forward to your response and the opportunity to work together for this talk.

Should you have any inquiries, please feel free to contact us.

Again, thank you for your time and patience.

Yours faithfully, 
Gary Hong
Senior Administrating Officer
Buddhist Sin Tak College
data_set.output:
Importance: Medium
Category: Public Relations and Community Outreach

data_set.instruction: You are a clerk working at Hong Kong Hospital Authority summarizing emails received. The summary should be concise and easy to understand. The maximum length of the summary is 100 words
data_set.input:
From: generaloffice@bstc.edu.hk
To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Invitation to Conduct Mental First Aid Talk at Buddhist Sin Tak College

Dear Mr./Miss,

Hope you are having a nice workday. I am writing on behalf of Buddhist Sin Tak College to extend a warm invitation to staff in the Hospital Authority to conduct a mental first-aid talk at our school. 

Our school is planning to organize the talk for our secondary school students next month on 13th September 2024, starting from 8：30 a.m. to 9 : 30 a.m. The talk aims to inform the students about measures that they can take to relieve themselves when they have some mental discomfort. 

Therefore, we would like to invite a professional psychologist from the Hospital Authority to host the mental health first-aid talk. We believe the expertise and experience of the psychologist from the Hospital Authority would significantly enhance the effectiveness and impact of this talk.

Thank you for considering this invitation. We believe that this collaboration between our school and the Hospital Authority could greatly enhance the mental well-being of our students. We look forward to your response and the opportunity to work together for this talk.

Should you have any inquiries, please feel free to contact us.

Again, thank you for your time and patience.

Yours faithfully, 
Gary Hong
Senior Administrating Officer
Buddhist Sin Tak College
data_set.output:
Summary:
Buddhist Sin Tak College invites the Hospital Authority to conduct a mental first-aid talk for secondary school students on September 13th, 2024, from 8:30 a.m. to 9:30 a.m. The talk aims to educate students on relieving mental discomfort. They request a professional psychologist from the Hospital Authority to host the talk, believing it will enhance its effectiveness. Gary Hong, Senior Administrating Officer, expresses gratitude for considering the invitation and looks forward to collaborating for the students' mental well-being.

From: itsupport@hkdatabasesolution.com
To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Meeting Minutes(11th July 2024) Request

Dear Sir/Madam,

Hope this email finds you well.

I am writing on behalf of Hong Kong Database Solution Ltd. On 11th July 2024, our IT support team had a meeting with Hospital Authority's administrative staff at a meeting room in HA Headquarter.

I would like to kindly ask for the meeting minutes from your side to see if the information gained from both sides aligns. This could facilitate our understanding of the requirements for the new database system.

Thank you and I look forward to hearing from your reply soon.

Yours faithfully,
IT Support Team
Hong Kong Database Solution Ltd.
data_set.output:
Importance: Medium
Category: Administrative and Policy Inquiries
